output_data.clarification_question: To properly map the diagnosis (ICD-10 F33 vs. F32), please clarify the overall duration of the current depressive episode (not just the recent severe worsening) and confirm if the patient has a history of previous distinct depressive episodes (Recurrent vs. First Episode).
output_data.suggested_answer: Assume the current episode began approximately 6 weeks ago, and that the patient has a history of previous distinct episodes (recurrent depression).
